mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DONATIONS (NAME, LASTNAME, DNI, DATE_BIRTH dateBirth, GENDER, MOBILE, PHONE, ADDRESS, CITY, PROVINCE, AMOUNT, CARD_NUMBER cardNumber, CARDHOLDER, DNI_CARDHOLDER dniCardholder, EXPIRATION_DATE expirationdate, OBSERVATION, ID_TYPE_PAY idTypePay, ID_EMPLOYEE_TEAM idEmployeeTeam, ID_CAMPAIGN idCampaign, CREATE_DATE) VALUES (#{request.name}, #{request.lastName}, #{request.dni}, #{request.dateBirth}, #{request.gender}, #{request.mobile}, #{request.phone}, #{request.address}, #{request.city}, #{request.province}, #{request.amount}, #{request.cardNumber}, #{request.cardholder}, #{request.dniCardholder}, #{request.expirateDate}, #{request.observation}, #{request.payType}, #{request.idEmployee}, #{request.idCampaign}, SYSDATE);
